sentences.sContent: She has played both a religious aesthete who abandons all possessions, as well as a serial killer, and her first starring role in “Aap Kaa Surroor- The Real Luv Story”.
sentences.sContent_eng: She has played both a religious aesthete who abandons all possessions, as well as a serial killer, and her first starring role in “Aap Kaa Surroor- The Real Luv Story”.
sentences.sCn: 她饰演一个抛弃所有财产的严谨的审美家，同时还是个连环杀手；她第一次担任主演是在“真爱的故事”。

words.tran: 美的；美学的；审美的，具有审美趣味的
审美的；美学的；有审美感的

trans.tranCn: 审美家, 唯美主义者
trans.tranOther: someone who loves and understands beautiful things, such as art and music
